org.apache.pluto.om
Interface Controller

All Known Subinterfaces:
ParameterCtrl, ParameterSetCtrl, PortletApplicationEntityListCtrl, PortletDefinitionCtrl, PortletEntityCtrl, PortletEntityListCtrl, PortletWindowCtrl, PortletWindowListCtrl, PreferenceCtrl, PreferenceSetCtrl, SecurityRoleRefCtrl, SecurityRoleRefSetCtrl, ServletDefinitionCtrl, ServletDefinitionListCtrl
public interface Controller

The Controller interface ...

This interface defines the controller as known from the MVC pattern. Its purpose is to provide write access to the data stored in the model.
